Feats-Skill-Nature -- Female Skilled Human Bard: 3

Background: Martial Disciple Deity: Pharasma

Skill Modifiers:
Acrobatics: +0 (dexterity; untrained) Diplomacy: +3 (charisma; untrained) Performance: +8 (charisma; trained)
Arcana: +2 (intelligence; untrained) Farming Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Religion: +1 (wisdom; untrained)
Astral Plane Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Forest Lore: +7 (intelligence; trained) Society: +2 (intelligence; untrained)
Athletics: +4 (strength; trained) Intimidation: +3 (charisma; untrained) Stealth: +5 (dexterity; trained)

Languages: Chthonian; Common; Diabolic; Fey
Skill Notes:
Armor Skill Penalty: -1 strength and dexterity skills
Bard Skills: Skill Trained (Occultism; Performance; Choose 6 from any)
Intelligence Language Bonus: +2 Language Count
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 1 from any)
Skilled Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Bardic Lore: Can use Bardic Lore to attempt to Recall Knowledge on any topic
Bonded Animal: Can use 1 week of interaction and a successful DC 20 Nature check to make an animal permanently helpful
Express Rider: Successful Nature increases the speed of self and 6 allies' mounts by half for a day
Influence Nature: Can spend at least a day of downtime to influence the behavior of local wildlife
Natural Medicine: Can use Nature to Treat Wounds; gives a +2 bonus in wilderness
Quick Jump: Can use High Jump and Long Jump as 1 action without an initial Stride
Train Animal: Can use days of training and a successful Nature check to teach an animal to perform a trick
Combat
Hit Points: 38 Armor Class: 18 (dexterity (3 max); trained) Class DC: Bard: 18 (charisma; trained)
Armor: Studded Leather Shield: None Weapons: Rapier (+6 1d6 P [Crit +d8]; dexterity; trained); Shield Bash (+5 1d4 B; strength; trained); Shield Boss (+5 1d6 B; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +6
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Unconventional Weaponry (Arbalest): Weapon Familiarity (Arbalest)
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +8 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Reflex Expertise: Save Expert (Reflex)
Magic
Spell Slots: O1: 3; O2: 2; OC1: 5 Focus Points: 1 Attack: Occult: +8 (charisma; trained) Spell DC: Occult: 18 (charisma; trained)
Spells:
Counter Performance (O1 Foc): (R) Allies in a 60' emanation may substitute a self Performance roll for a save vs. the triggering auditory or visual effect
Courageous Anthem (OC1 Foc): (1) 60' emanation gives allies +1 attack, damage, and saves vs. fear for 1 rd
Sure Strike (O1): (1) Self uses the better of 2 attack rolls, ignores concealed and hidden conditions, and ignores circumstance penalties on the next Strike in the same turn
Magic Notes:
Composition Spells: Knows the Counter Performance and Courageous Anthem occult spells/Has a focus pool
Enigma: Knows the Sure Strike occult spell
Bard Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the occult tradition
Cantrip Expansion: Can prepare 2 additional cantrips each day or add 2 additional cantrips to repertoire
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each rank without learning a heightened version
Notes
Validation Errors:
General And Skill Feat Allocation: 2 available vs. 5 allocated
Influence Nature Feat: Requires level (currently 3) >= 7 and nature rank (currently 2) >= 3
